segments.text: You're right--Italian ! Ha ! Ha ! I was trying to trick you , but you didn't fall for it !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I almost did ! Actually , I don't know that much about coffee , even though I sell it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I could give you a few pointers if you want . I know a lot about coffee .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks . Maybe if things slow down later I'll stop by your table .
segments.speaker: S2
